# BIRD-INTERACT 1.0

Content:
## News - [2025-08-22] **Bug Fix**: In Bird-Interact-Agent code, we fixed a bug that when evaluating phase-2 SQL, the stored phase-1 SQL cannot be executed successfully, leading to a lower success rate of Phase-2. This bug only affects those tasks where phase1 sql does some operations on the database, e.g. CREATE table, etc. ## ğŸ§¸ Overview BIRD-INTERACT, an interactive text-to-SQL benchmark, **re-imagines Text-to-SQL evaluation via lens of dynamic interactions**. The environment blends a hierarchical knowledge base, database documentation and a function-driven user simulator to recreate authentic enterprise environments across full **CRUD** operations. It offers two rigorous test modes: (1) passive **Conversational Interaction** and (2) active **Agentic Interaction**, spanning 600 annotated tasks including Business Intelligence (BI), CRUD operations and etc., each guarded by executable test cases. Typical evaluations trigger 1,968-5,496 interaction turns between model and user simulator, while state-of-the-art reasoning models currently solve only **â‰ˆ24%** and **â‰ˆ18%** of tasks, underscoring the benchmark's challenge.

### âœ… Two Evaluation Modes BIRD-INTERACT supports two evaluation modes as mentioned above: - **c-Interact**: Conversational Interaction which is a passive mode and the workflow is fixed. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_conv`. - **a-Interact**: Agentic Interaction which is an embodied active mode where the workflow is dynamic and led by models. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_agent`.
Translation:
## Haberler - [2025-08-22] **Hata DÃ¼zeltme**: Bird-Interact-Agent kodunda, phase-2 SQL deÄŸerlendirilirken, saklanan phase-1 SQL'in baÅŸarÄ±yla Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±lamadÄ±ÄŸÄ± ve Phase-2'nin baÅŸarÄ± oranÄ±nÄ±n dÃ¼ÅŸtÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼ bir hata dÃ¼zeltildi. Bu hata yalnÄ±zca phase1 sql'in veritabanÄ±nda CREATE table gibi iÅŸlemler yaptÄ±ÄŸÄ± gÃ¶revleri etkiler. ## ğŸ§¸ Genel BakÄ±ÅŸ BIRD-INTERACT, etkileÅŸimli bir text-to-SQL kÄ±yaslamasÄ± olup, **Text-to-SQL deÄŸerlendirmesini dinamik etkileÅŸimler bakÄ±ÅŸ aÃ§Ä±sÄ±yla yeniden tasarlar**. Ortam, hiyerarÅŸik bir bilgi tabanÄ±nÄ±, veritabanÄ± dokÃ¼mantasyonunu ve iÅŸlev odaklÄ± bir kullanÄ±cÄ± simÃ¼latÃ¶rÃ¼nÃ¼ bir araya getirerek, tam **CRUD** iÅŸlemleri boyunca Ã¶zgÃ¼n kurumsal ortamlarÄ± yeniden oluÅŸturur. Ä°ki titiz test modu sunar: (1) pasif **KonuÅŸma EtkileÅŸimi** ve (2) aktif **Ajan EtkileÅŸimi**, her biri Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±labilir test vakalarÄ± ile korunan 600 ek anotasyonlu gÃ¶revi kapsar; Ä°ÅŸ ZekasÄ± (BI), CRUD iÅŸlemleri vb. dahil. Tipik deÄŸerlendirmeler model ve kullanÄ±cÄ± simÃ¼latÃ¶rÃ¼ arasÄ±nda 1.968-5.496 etkileÅŸim turunu tetiklerken, gÃ¼ncel Ã¼st dÃ¼zey akÄ±l yÃ¼rÃ¼tme modelleri yalnÄ±zca **â‰ˆ%24** ve **â‰ˆ%18** gÃ¶revi Ã§Ã¶zebiliyor; bu da kÄ±yaslamanÄ±n zorluÄŸunu vurgular.

### âœ… Ä°ki DeÄŸerlendirme Modu BIRD-INTERACT yukarÄ±da bahsedilen iki deÄŸerlendirme modunu destekler: - **c-Interact**: KonuÅŸma EtkileÅŸimi, pasif bir moddur ve iÅŸ akÄ±ÅŸÄ± sabittir. Kod ve detaylÄ± bilgiye `bird_interact_conv` dosyasÄ±ndan ulaÅŸabilirsiniz. - **a-Interact**: Ajan EtkileÅŸimi, iÅŸ akÄ±ÅŸÄ±nÄ±n dinamik ve modeller tarafÄ±ndan yÃ¶nlendirildiÄŸi aktif bir moddur. Kod ve detaylÄ± bilgiye `bird_interact_agent` dosyasÄ±ndan ulaÅŸabilirsiniz.

Content: ### ğŸ£ Lite Version We are releasing a lite version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-lite-exp`, which includes 270 high-quality real-world tasks specifically for PostgreSQL. This is a good starting point for quick experimentation. ### ğŸ¦œ Full Version The full version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-full`, is a comprehensive benchmark that includes 600 tasks for PostgreSQL. It covers a wide range of SQL operations and user queries. The full version is coming soon. ### Model Performance Results on BIRD-INTERACT Lite #### 1. **c-Interact** Performance | Rank | Model Name | Normalized Reward | Level | |:------:|--------------------|:-------:|:--------------:| | 1 | o3-mini | 33.04 | ğŸ† Excellent Chat | | 2 | GPT-4o | 30.33 | ğŸ’ Good Chat | | 3 | Gemini-2.0-flash | 27.41 | ğŸ’ Good Chat | | 4 | Claude-3.7-sonnet | 26.60 | âœ¨ Standard | | 5 | DeepSeek-R1 | 21.74 | âœ¨ Standard | | 6 | Qwen3 | 20.33 | âšª Basic | | 7 | DeepSeek-V3 | 15.85 | âšª Basic | #### 2. **a-Interact** Performance | Rank | Model Name | Budget Parameters* | Avg Steps/Task | Avg Cost (USD)/Task | Normalized Reward | Level | |:------:|--------------------|:-------------------:|:----------------:|:---------------------:|:-------------------:|:---------------------:| | 1 | Claude-3.7-sonnet | 6/6 | 15.4 | $0.6668 | 29.19 | ğŸ† Excellent Interaction | | 2 | o3-mini | 6/6 | 7.8 | $0.0754 | 21.07 | ğŸ’ Good Interaction | | 3 | DeepSeek-V3 | 6/6 | 15.6 | $0.0629 | 19.19 | ğŸ’ Good Interaction | | 4 | Qwen3 | 6/6 | 12.5 | $0.0278 | 18.74 | âœ¨ Standard | | 5 | GPT-4o | 6/6 | 15.3 | $0.4594 | 18.37 | âœ¨ Standard | | 6 | Gemini-2.0-flash | 6/6 | 13.2 | $0.0337 | 17.26 | âšª Basic | | 7 | DeepSeek-R1 | 6/6 | 12.0 | $0.0931 | 17.07 | âšª Basic | > \* Budget Parameters: Starting Budget/User Patience Budget, measured by our virtual currency *bird-coin*s . Refer to [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) for more details. ### Interaction-Time Scaling (ITS) Interaction-Time Scaling (ITS) refers to a model's ability to continuously increase its end performance through multi-turn interactions. When this interactive performance surpasses the model's idealized single-turn performance on a fully specified, unambiguous task, we say it satisfies the **ITS law**. As user patience grows and interaction turns accumulate, performance keeps improving, demonstrating that the model can sustain effective communication over extended dialogue. Currently, we only find claude-3-7-sonnet satisfies the ITS law.

AdÄ±m/GÃ¶rev | Ort. Maliyet (USD)/GÃ¶rev | Normalize Ã–dÃ¼l | Seviye | |:------:|--------------------|:-------------------:|:----------------:|:---------------------:|:-------------------:|:---------------------:| | 1 | Claude-3.7-sonnet | 6/6 | 15.4 | $0.6668 | 29.19 | ğŸ† MÃ¼kemmel EtkileÅŸim | | 2 | o3-mini | 6/6 | 7.8 | $0.0754 | 21.07 | ğŸ’ Ä°yi EtkileÅŸim | | 3 | DeepSeek-V3 | 6/6 | 15.6 | $0.0629 | 19.19 | ğŸ’ Ä°yi EtkileÅŸim | | 4 | Qwen3 | 6/6 | 12.5 | $0.0278 | 18.74 | âœ¨ Standart | | 5 | GPT-4o | 6/6 | 15.3 | $0.4594 | 18.37 | âœ¨ Standart | | 6 | Gemini-2.0-flash | 6/6 | 13.2 | $0.0337 | 17.26 | âšª Temel | | 7 | DeepSeek-R1 | 6/6 | 12.0 | $0.0931 | 17.07 | âšª Temel | > \* BÃ¼tÃ§e Parametreleri: BaÅŸlangÄ±Ã§ BÃ¼tÃ§esi/KullanÄ±cÄ± SabÄ±r BÃ¼tÃ§esi, sanal para birimimiz *bird-coin* ile Ã¶lÃ§Ã¼lÃ¼r . Daha fazla bilgi iÃ§in [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) adresine bakÄ±nÄ±z. ### EtkileÅŸim-ZamanÄ± Ã–lÃ§eklenmesi (ITS) EtkileÅŸim-ZamanÄ± Ã–lÃ§eklenmesi (ITS), bir modelin Ã§oklu etkileÅŸimler yoluyla nihai performansÄ±nÄ± sÃ¼rekli artÄ±rabilme yeteneÄŸini ifade eder. Bu etkileÅŸimli performans, modelin tam olarak belirlenmiÅŸ, belirsizliÄŸi olmayan bir gÃ¶revdeki ideal tek seferlik performansÄ±nÄ± aÅŸtÄ±ÄŸÄ±nda, **ITS yasasÄ±nÄ±** karÅŸÄ±ladÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ± sÃ¶yleriz. KullanÄ±cÄ± sabrÄ± arttÄ±kÃ§a ve etkileÅŸim turlarÄ± biriktikÃ§e, performans geliÅŸmeye devam eder ve modelin uzun diyaloglarda etkili iletiÅŸimi sÃ¼rdÃ¼rebildiÄŸini gÃ¶sterir. Åu anda yalnÄ±zca claude-3-7-sonnet'in ITS yasasÄ±nÄ± karÅŸÄ±ladÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ± gÃ¶rÃ¼yoruz.

Content: ## ğŸ“¦ Dataset Details ### Dataset Description - **Database:** The complete PostgreSQL database can be download from [the Google Drive](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KABce6czIqL9kMyIX7i-_A0CIQoDnmyW/view). Check the [Quick Eval](#quick-eval) section for more details. - **data:** Each data instance contain the following main parts: - `selected_database`: The name of the database. - `query`: The unambiguous user query. - `amb_user_query`: The user query with injected ambiguities. - `user_query_ambiguity`: The ambiguities injected into the user query. - `non_critical_ambiguity`: The non-critical ambiguities like order, limit, etc. - `knowledge_ambiguity`: The ambiguities created by masked external knowledges. - `sol_sql`: The ground truth SQL solution. - `preprocess_sql`: SQL queries to run before executing the solution or prediction. - `clean_up_sql`: SQL queries to run after the test cases to revert any changes made to the database. - `test_cases`: A set of test cases to validate the predicted corrected SQL. - `follow_up`: The labeled follow up questions. - `external_knowledge`: The external knowledge related to the specific task. - **evaluation:** The evaluation code is available in the [`./evaluation`](./evaluation) directory. - **Curated by:** BIRD Team & Google Cloud - **License:** [cc-by-sa-4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) - **HuggingFace Dataset Card:** [bird-interact-lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-lite) ### Dataset Uses To avoid data leakage by auto-crawling, we do not include GT solution sqls and test cases along with data. please email [bird.bench25@gmail.com](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/mailto:bird.bench25@gmail.com) with the tag `[bird-interact-lite GT&Test Cases]` in title for full set, which will be sent automatically.
Translation: ## ğŸ“¦ Veri Seti DetaylarÄ± ### Veri Seti AÃ§Ä±klamasÄ± - **VeritabanÄ±:** Tam PostgreSQL veritabanÄ± [Google Drive'dan](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KABce6czIqL9kMyIX7i-_A0CIQoDnmyW/view) indirilebilir. Daha fazla detay iÃ§in [HÄ±zlÄ± DeÄŸerlendirme](#quick-eval) bÃ¶lÃ¼mÃ¼ne bakÄ±nÄ±z. - **veri:** Her bir veri Ã¶rneÄŸi aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki ana bÃ¶lÃ¼mleri iÃ§erir: - `selected_database`: VeritabanÄ±nÄ±n adÄ±. - `query`: BelirsizliÄŸi olmayan kullanÄ±cÄ± sorgusu. - `amb_user_query`: Enjekte edilmiÅŸ belirsizliklere sahip kullanÄ±cÄ± sorgusu. - `user_query_ambiguity`: KullanÄ±cÄ± sorgusuna enjekte edilen belirsizlikler. - `non_critical_ambiguity`: SÄ±ra, limit gibi kritik olmayan belirsizlikler. - `knowledge_ambiguity`: MaskelenmiÅŸ harici bilgilerden oluÅŸturulan belirsizlikler. - `sol_sql`: GerÃ§ek SQL Ã§Ã¶zÃ¼mÃ¼. - `preprocess_sql`: Ã‡Ã¶zÃ¼mÃ¼ veya tahmini Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rmadan Ã¶nce Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±lacak SQL sorgularÄ±. - `clean_up_sql`: VeritabanÄ±nda yapÄ±lan deÄŸiÅŸiklikleri geri almak iÃ§in test vakalarÄ±ndan sonra Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±lacak SQL sorgularÄ±. - `test_cases`: Tahmin edilen dÃ¼zeltici SQL'i doÄŸrulamak iÃ§in bir dizi test vakasÄ±. - `follow_up`: Etiketli takip sorularÄ±. - `external_knowledge`: Belirli gÃ¶revle ilgili harici bilgiler. - **deÄŸerlendirme:** DeÄŸerlendirme kodu [`./evaluation`](./evaluation) dizininde mevcuttur. - **HazÄ±rlayan:** BIRD Ekibi & Google Cloud - **Lisans:** [cc-by-sa-4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) - **HuggingFace Veri Seti KartÄ±:** [bird-interact-lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-lite) ### Veri Seti KullanÄ±mlarÄ± Otomatik tarama ile veri sÄ±zÄ±ntÄ±sÄ±nÄ± Ã¶nlemek iÃ§in GT Ã§Ã¶zÃ¼m sql'leri ve test vakalarÄ±nÄ± verilerle birlikte sunmuyoruz. tam set iÃ§in baÅŸlÄ±kta `[bird-interact-lite GT&Test Cases]` etiketi ile [bird.bench25@gmail.com](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/mailto:bird.bench25@gmail.com) adresine e-posta atabilirsiniz, set otomatik olarak gÃ¶nderilecektir.

Content:
```bash
from datasets import load_dataset
# Load the flash version of the dataset
dataset = load_dataset("birdsql/bird-interact-lite")
print(dataset["lite"][0])

# Load the full version of the dataset (coming soon)
dataset = load_dataset("birdsql/bird-interact-full")
print(dataset["full"][0])
```

Content:
The details about running **a-interact** can be found in `./bird_interact_agent/README.md`; and **c-interact** can be found in `./bird_interact_conv/README.md`.

## ğŸ“° News

ğŸš€ We're excited to announce the release of the **[BIRD-Interact-Full (600)](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)** set!  
It's a tough one â€” the best LLMs are only achieving a **16.33%** success rate, with just **10.0%** on the `c-interact` and `a-interact` portions.  
ğŸ‘‰ For more details, please visit our [project website](https://bird-interact.github.io/).

ğŸ“¬ We'll be sending the **Ground Truth & Test cases** to our mailing list this week.  
If you want early access, please send an email as instructed on the site for an **automatic download**.  

ğŸ’¾ On another note, we've also released a SQLite version of **[LiveSQLBench-Lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/livesqlbench-base-lite-sqlite)** for easier local research.  
The full **LiveSQLBench-Base** and **-Large** versions are coming soon!

## ğŸ“‹ Todo Lists

- [x] Release lite version, bird-interact-lite (270).
- [x] Release conversational version, bird-interact-conv.
- [x] Release agent version, bird-interact-agent.
- [x] Release Full bird-interact-full (600).
- [ ] SFT / RL an User Simulator

## Created By:
BIRD Team & Google Cloud

## ğŸ“° Haberler

ğŸš€ **[BIRD-Interact-Full (600)](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)** setinin yayÄ±nlandÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ± duyurmaktan heyecan duyuyoruz!  
Zorlu bir set â€” en iyi LLM'ler sadece **%16,33** baÅŸarÄ± oranÄ± elde ediyor, `c-interact` ve `a-interact` bÃ¶lÃ¼mlerinde ise yalnÄ±zca **%10,0** baÅŸarÄ± saÄŸlanabiliyor.  
ğŸ‘‰ Daha fazla detay iÃ§in [proje web sitemizi](https://bird-interact.github.io/) ziyaret edebilirsiniz.

ğŸ“¬ Bu hafta **GerÃ§ek SonuÃ§lar & Test vakalarÄ±nÄ±** posta listemize gÃ¶ndereceÄŸiz.  
Erken eriÅŸim isterseniz, sitede belirtilen ÅŸekilde e-posta gÃ¶ndererek **otomatik indirme** talep edebilirsiniz.  

ğŸ’¾ AyrÄ±ca, yerel araÅŸtÄ±rmalar iÃ§in kolaylÄ±k saÄŸlamak amacÄ±yla **[LiveSQLBench-Lite'Ä±n SQLite sÃ¼rÃ¼mÃ¼nÃ¼](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/livesqlbench-base-lite-sqlite)** da yayÄ±nladÄ±k.  
Tam **LiveSQLBench-Base** ve **-Large** sÃ¼rÃ¼mleri yakÄ±nda geliyor!
